text: tavada ohu nodanna andamata ohuta jivanopayak ohu (allah) laba denneya. kavurun allahva (sampurnayenma) visvasa karanneda ohuta, ohuma (sampurnayenma) pramanavat keneki. niyata vasayenma allah tama apeksavan anivaryayenma at kara ganneya. (ehet) allah sæma dæyakatama (ek niyamita kalayakda) pramanayakda niyata vasayenma uganvanneya. (e anuvama sidu vanu æta)
